hibernate-mapping.query: select max(s.storagedirid) from SrmStorageDir s where s.storagedirid like :id
select max(i.ipqamchannelid) from IpQamChannel i where i.ipqamchannelid like :id
select max(s.stdirglobalid) from AmsStorageDir s where s.stdirglobalid like :id
select v from VodServer v,WebSVodSRel r where v.vodsid=r.vodsid and r.websid=:id
select s from SrmStorage s,StorageVsRel r where s.storageid=r.storageid and r.vodsid=:id
select c from ConsumeList c where c.desresouce='0'
